catalyst: Ru(bpy)32 is used as a dye-sensitizer and acts as the catalyst in the experiment. The text specifically mentions functionalizing the 2D Fe-MNS catalyst with Ru(bpy)32.
light source: 300-W Xe lamp (Solar edge 700, set at 100 mW cm A2 ) covered with a 420 nm cut-off filter
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is a mixed solution of 5 mL of acetonitrile, 1 mL of triethanolamine (TEOA), and 20 mg of Ru(bpy)3.
